des: "A light, cool, refreshing summertime dessert.  Put in serving cups (parfait glass) and top with a fanned strawberry.  This recipe contains raw eggs. We recommend that pregnant women, young children, the elderly and the infirm do not consume raw eggs."
ins: Chop hulled strawberries in a food processor, leaving a few chunks.  Stir in sugar.  In a bowl, whip cream until stiff peaks form.  In another bowl, whip egg whites until stiff peaks form.  Fold whipped cream into strawberries.  Fold egg whites into strawberry mixture.  Serve immediately.
